name: viral-ngs-assembly-analysis
title: viral-ngs-assembly-analysis
summary: Map reads to the final assembly and compute some figures of merit

inputSpec.name: novocraft_license
inputSpec.help: (Optional) license for novocraft, which enables multi-threaded novoalign

inputSpec.name: viral_ngs_version
inputSpec.help: Desired version of broadinstitute/viral-ngs image on Docker Hub, either :TAG or @DIGEST

outputSpec.name: all_reads
outputSpec.help: reads aligned to final assembly and unmapped reads

outputSpec.name: bam_stat
outputSpec.help: Statistics of the reads aligned to final assembly

outputSpec.name: reads_paired_count
outputSpec.help: Reads mapped to assembly and properly paired

outputSpec.name: assembly_read_alignments
outputSpec.help: reads aligned to final assembly (mapped reads only)

outputSpec.name: assembly_read_index
outputSpec.help: index of reads aligned to final assembly (mapped reads only)

outputSpec.name: coverage_plot
outputSpec.help: PDF report of coverage of mapped reads
